metadata.name: Naked Soul
metadata.description:
When a person exposes his body to you, takes off his clothes, it's intimate. This is usually done before making love. That's what everyone does…
You can be naked in front of a person physically, but can't express the highest degree of trust to him by exposing your soul to him.
To open to a person your scarred soul and let another person into the most intimate, to let them know all your
depth… It's much more intimate than exposing the body.
There is nothing more erotic than a naked soul.

NUDE×GM
